alert.note: Alert for Mobile Central; Mobile Inland; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 09 at 1:12AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Mobile, southwestern Washington, eastern George and southeastern Greene Counties through 200 AM CST... At 111 AM CST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles south of Leakesville to 3 miles southeast of Lucedale to 6 miles north of Wade. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Citronelle, Lucedale, Chunchula, Gulfcrest, Semmes, Tanner Williams, I65 And AL 158 and Wilmer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
